syntax_editor_macro.comments: This template creates the code necessary to access the GetShortUniqueString() function contained in the GetShortUniqueString script include.
syntax_editor_macro.name: GetShortUniqueString
syntax_editor_macro.text: var GetShortUniqueString = x_snc_devtools.GetShortUniqueString; GetShortUniqueString('This is a string that exceeds 40 characters and would be cut off if used as the name for a business rule. But we want to avoid name collisions.',40);
